subject: Re: Shipping update for order #SSN1705
description_text:
Another track and trace But its stands delivery 20/25 july I dont want accept that Maybe u use ups dhl for express livery Or refund mine money Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone Op 24 jun 2025 om 12:39 heeft SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> het volgende geschreven: ﻿

 Items in this shipment

 Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1

 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

Mean time o looked but im not the only one I Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone Op 24 jun 2025 om 13:10 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven: ﻿ 
 
 Hi GD Smit We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours). To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/779?follow=email Thank you for your patience. View ticket If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/779?follow=email Regards, simsonn Support Team 





 
 




779:4206036
Hi GD Smit,     Sorry, the 3 parcels from Holland were returned to us, it was a problem with the logistics provider, we have changed the logistics provider we work with and reshipped the parcels.
